an7.25:1.3: katame ca, bhikkhave, satta aparihaniya dhamma?
an7.25:1.4: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, bhikkhu saddha bhavissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.25:2.6: pannavanto bhavissanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani.
an7.25:3.1: Yavakivanca, bhikkhave, ime satta aparihaniya dhamma bhikkhusu thassanti, imesu ca sattasu aparihaniyesu dhammesu bhikkhu sandississanti; vuddhiyeva, bhikkhave, bhikkhunam patikankha, no parihani”ti.
